title: HealthInsurancePlan
description: A US-style health insurance plan, including PPOs, EPOs, and HMOs.

allOf.description: A utility class that serves as the umbrella for a number of 'intangible' things such as quantities, structured values, etc.

benefitsSummaryUrl.description: The URL that goes directly to the summary of benefits and coverage for the specific standard plan or plan variation.

contactPoint.description: A contact point for a person or organization.

healthPlanDrugTier.description: The tier(s) of drugs offered by this formulary or insurance plan.

healthPlanId.description: The 14-character, HIOS-generated Plan ID number. (Plan IDs must be unique, even across different markets.)

healthPlanMarketingUrl.description: The URL that goes directly to the plan brochure for the specific standard plan or plan variation.

usesHealthPlanIdStandard.description: The standard for interpreting thePlan ID. The preferred is "HIOS". See the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services for more details.
